attributes.title: Stony Brook Farm
attributes.description:
Created on April 23, 2011 by mkc330 on Sourcemap.org:

Stony Brook Farm is a small pig farm run by Bob Comis. He cares for 125 pigs on his farm, which allows him to provide individual attention to each of his pigs.
